entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is referred to as a symbol of hope for many and someone who might be able to destroy He Who Must Not Be Named.

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: He Who Must Not Be Named is mentioned as the one Harry might be destined to destroy.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is a Ministry official who tries to persuade Harry to stand alongside the Ministry.

entities.name: the ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as an organization that Harry might consider standing alongside.
